page.title: 10The closure of William Penn
page.content: The closure of William Penn school has been a great blow,but in our area a school had to go and William Penn was chosen.The Secretary of State,Sir Keith Joseph decided that it was not worth having 3 schools in the Watford area for such a small amount of children so William Penn went.200 of William Penn's pupils will go to John Penrose in Middlesex and others will go to Durrants and a handful will go to other schools around the area such as Rickmansworth school.Children who are in 4th year at primary school who have brothers and sisters in William Penn would go to the school the brothers or sisters chose to go to. When William Penn closes there will not be a job loss because the council has to find jobs for all those in the school unless they decide to take retirement.
